20 #ifndef __G_WAKEUP_H__
21 #define __G_WAKEUP_H__
22 
23 #include <glib/gpoll.h>
24 
25 typedef struct _GWakeup GWakeup;
26 
27 GWakeup *       g_wakeup_new            (void);
28 void            g_wakeup_free           (GWakeup *wakeup);
29 
30 void            g_wakeup_get_pollfd     (GWakeup *wakeup,
31                                          GPollFD *poll_fd);
32 void            g_wakeup_signal         (GWakeup *wakeup);
33 void            g_wakeup_acknowledge    (GWakeup *wakeup);
34 
35 #endif
